channel.title: Lois Brown
channel.description: Recent news about Lois Brown, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Enjoying #AuroraRibFest with Peter Munger & his son Justin. Great food! Great people! On all w/e at Machell Park. http://t.co/2EF9VBUn8T

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: @pmharper announces $45 M in humanitarian aid for the Syrian people affected by the conflict, bringing our total help to $203.5 M.

item.title: Mentioned by YorkRegion.com
item.description:
MP Brown supported foreign aid policies
I agree with Mr. Porter and, at one time, so did Newmarket-Aurora MP Lois Brown. At her Jan. 15 pre-budget consultation meeting at the Aurora Cultural Centre, the president of the Aurora Seniors Association recommended the government re-evaluate foreign ...
